bond_use_2: Te proteja del Daño o el Destino
bond_use_top: Cuando uses un vínculo, pídele que:
bonusdice_query: Otro dado (Ventaja, Dado de Vínculo o Apoyo), p.e. 1d8 + 1d8 + 1d6
boons_1: Aumenta un Dominio de d8 a d10
boons_2: Aumenta un Dominio de d6 a d8
boons_3: Advance your Role die to d8
boons_5: Cuando apoyas o refuerzas, el dado que otorgas crece en un paso de tamaño.
boons_6: When you mark Burn for an extra domain, take two extra dice instead of one.
boons_7: When you expend a Charge, roll +2d4 and keep the highest.
name: Name:
recite_command:
What squadron strategy did you use?
How did we see your willpower in action?
How did military or social protocol help your purpose?
recite_tactical:
How did you engage combat?
How was your skill, agility, or courage shown?
How did you take our breath away?
recite_operations:
How was your knowledge or creativity shown?
How was stealth or subterfuge displayed?
How did you scout?
recite_systems:
How did you teach something?
How did you employ technology to your means?
How did science help your purpose?
recite_top: How does your Role, Burn (an added Domain), or Charges manifest in the contest?
roll_prevails: Your action goes well and you overcome the challenge. The best pilot earns Glory equal to the target number. Pilots who prevail earn half that amount (round up).
roll_suffers: Pilots who suffer each earn 1 Glory. If you take harm while flying, your Squadron takes harm, too.
